mapper.select: select distinct g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, c.cateName, c.cateParent, gdsSize, gdsColor, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_cate2 c on g.cateParent = c.cateParent where c.cateName = #{cateName}

select distinct a.gdsNum, a.gdsName, a.gdsPrice, a.cateParent, a.gdsStock, a.gdsDate, a.cateName from tbl_goods AS a left join tbl_cate2 AS c on a.cateParent = c.cateParent and a.cateName = c.cateName where c.cateParent = #{cateParent}
